mapper.select: select * from mb_part_class where PART_CLASS = #{partClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COLUMN_STATUS !='W'
mapper.insert:
insert into mb_part_class
PART_CLASS,
PART_CLASS_DESC,
PART_CLASS_LEVEL,
PARENT_PART_CLASS,
COMPANY,
#{partClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partClassDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partClassLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentPartClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select
PART_CLASS pk_value, PART_CLASS || ' ' || PART_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
PART_CLASS pk_value,concat(PART_CLASS,' ',PART_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_part_class

select
PART_CLASS pk_value, PART_CLASS || ' ' || PART_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
PART_CLASS pk_value,concat(PART_CLASS,' ',PART_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_part_class where PART_CLASS_LEVEL = #{partClassLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
PART_CLASS pk_value, PART_CLASS || ' ' || PART_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
PART_CLASS pk_value,concat(PART_CLASS,' ',PART_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_part_class
where PARENT_PART_CLASS = #{parentPartClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
PART_CLASS pk_value, PART_CLASS || ' ' || PART_CLASS_DESC pk_desc
PART_CLASS pk_value,concat(PART_CLASS,' ',PART_CLASS_DESC) pk_desc
FROM mb_part_class where PART_CLASS_LEVEL = #{partClassLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
